name: ListArchiveReasons
description:
Retrieve a list of archive reasons.

Use this tool to get a list of reasons for archiving within the Ashby service. Requires the 'hiringProcessMetadataRead' permission.

parameters.name: include_archived_interview_plans
parameters.description: Set to true to include archived interview plans in the results.

value_schema.description: When true, includes archived interview plans

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: When true, includes archived interview plans

value_schema.description: When true, includes archived interview plans
